newsitem.title: UK: Europe cotton offtake limited, despite NY futures.
newsitem.headline: Europe cotton offtake limited, despite NY futures.

text.p: Offtake in Europe stayed limited despite broader interest in U.S. and Australian cottons on continued weakness in New York futures.
But many spinners remain uncertain about supply in the third quarter and not all seem convinced that the trade's current asking prices for the periods are warranted.

On the other had, a Syrian trade delegation now in France is believed to have done some June/September business. Mill buyers have also been inclined to consider offers of other origins that might serve as substitutes in current production mixes.
